title: Buf-Puf Back Scrub Body Sponge with Reusable Handle  (Pack of 4)
description: <P>One Buf-Puf Body Sponge<BR>One Reusable Handle</P> <P><STRONG>Double-Sided Buf-Puf™ Body Sponge with Reusable Handle</STRONG>.á Thoroughly cleans and refreshes your skin.á Use every day with your favorite cleanser.á <STRONG>Perfect Prep for Sunless Tanning!</STRONG></P> <P><STRONG>Leaves Skin Feeling Clean and Refreshed!</STRONG></P> <UL> <LI>Use every day with your favorite soap or cleanser. <LI>Thoroughly cleanses skin of dirt and excess oil even in hard-to-reach areas. <LI>Smoothes away rough, dry skin: </LI> <UL> <LI>White side for all-over cleansing <LI>Blue side for smoothing of elbows and feet. </LI></UL> <LI>Leaves skin smooth and soft, perfectly prepped for shaving and sunless tanning lotion.</LI></UL> <P>by 3M</P>

title: The Regimen - Complete acne treatment kit from Acne.org (Travel Kit - 4-5 days)
description: Hi everybody, I'm Dan. I suffered for years with acne and tried everything. Like many of you have probably experienced as well, nothing worked. So, I went to work researching everything I possibly could about acne and after years of trial and error I found a treatment routine that cleared me up completely using only common drugstore products. I made Acne.org to share my regimen with the world. Pretty much everyone who follows it closely gets clear--even people with severe acne. After 6 years of The Regimen being completely not-for-profit, I developed a line of larger sized, higher quality products to make The Regimen more affordable and effective for everybody. Here they are! -Dan

title: Kent Hand-Made 25mm Wet/Thick Coarse Hair Large Handled Rake Comb - 10T
description:
This comb is faux tortoishell, hand polished to glide through the hair without causing damage or scratching the scalp.


Handmade 200mm large handled rake comb, wet/thick hair, coarse
